name: ULTRAKILL Saved Data
summary: Learn about .BEPIS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: In ULTRAKILL, players play as a robot that must descend through various layers of Hell. The game was developed by Arsi "Haktia" Patala and published by New Blood Interactive.

ULTRAKILL records players' progress in a set of BEPIS files. BEPIS files whose names' begin with lvl# record a player's level-specific progress. Other BEPIS files record a player's difficulty-specific progress or their high score in the game's Cyber Grind mode (which pits players against an endless wave of enemies).

description: A BEPIS file contains saved game data used by ULTRAKILL, a first-person shooter for Windows. It stores a record of a player's general- or level-specific progress. ULTRAKILL stores BEPIS files in its ~ULTRAKILL/â€‹saves directory.

instructions: BEPIS files are not meant to be opened or edited. However, players can attempt to edit BEPIS files in a hex editor if they so desire, to modify their save data. ULTRAKILL modders have created a guide that contains useful information for those who want to edit their BEPIS files' contents.
